details.message:
`001.004.001 Mk_SL`
- Test creates the following System Lookups. 
- Crew Type "Alpha".
- Expense Category "Beta".
- Meter Reading Type "Wear Percentage".
- Material Item Category "MIC".
- Purchasing Commodity Code "PCC".
- Inventory Unit of Measure "IUM".
- Units Associated to the Asset Level of Service "LOSU".
- Country Codes "USA".
- State/Province Name Abbreviation of "CA".
details.name: 001.004.001 Mk_SL
